message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 to you, offering unparalleled benefits and quality. Considering its immense value and your potential needs, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $13500. This is a special opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you require any further information.
